headline: O. Smith Corporation (AOS) Appoints Paul Jones as Senior Vice President, General Counsel, and Chief Compliance Officer
summary: Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) is included in our list of the 14 Tech Stocks to Sell Now According to Ken Fisher. On August 28, 2025, A. O. Smith Corporation (NYSE:AOS) appointed Paul Jones as senior vice president, general counsel, and chief compliance officer, effective October 1. Meanwhile, Jim Stern, who previously served as general counsel since […]
